thread.title: Dayton’s Pollard has worked to improve free-throw touch
thread.title_full: Dayton’s Pollard has worked to improve free-throw touch

title: Dayton’s Pollard has worked to improve free-throw touch
text:
Posted: 8:30 p.m. Friday, Oct. 23, 2015 Dayton’s Pollard has worked to improve free-throw touch Staff Writer DAYTON — 
A pair of red, white and blue basketball shoes hung around Kendall Pollard’s neck as he talked to members of the media Thursday at the Cronin Center. The Dayton junior forward has often led the team in flash when it comes to the style of his shoes. 
Last season, Pollard wore Nike KD 7 (Kevin Durant) shoes most of the season. This season, Pollard wants to stick to the Kobe Bryant 10 brand. Continue Reading Read the complete story... The story you're reading is premium content available on our new premium website. Subscribers to the Dayton Daily News, Springfield News-Sun and Journal-News have access to MyDaytonDailyNews.com.
